ygData.subject: RE: Bard Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: What are the chances of a bard less than 30th level successfully Lamenting a 30+ mob? I would guess not very high.  Looks like the quest components located in
ygData.messageBody:
What are the chances of a bard less than 30th level successfully Lamenting a
30+ mob? I would guess not very high. Looks like the quest components
located in Solusek A as well as the carapace in Lower Guk will be the tough
ones to get for us younger bards.

Galtin of E'ci

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Ryan Honeyman [SMTP:slasher@...]
> Sent: Monday, October 18, 1999 12:48 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Quests
>
> From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>
>
> >Can you safely get to the area where the Solusek Mage and
> >Champion spawn by singing the Invis song or are there mobs
> >along the path that can See Invis?
>
> If no shaman are nearby, you can make it. But chances are if
> you cannot fight your way in, you cannot fight your way out.
> Some champions and mages are blue to me at 40. Level 30
> monsters are nasty, it will take a strong group of level 30s
> to attempt to break into the king's room. Use Lament everywhere.
>
> Harmonic Distortion, 40th unchained melody.
> League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
> < Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
> with the subject lol.
